section.title: XML scenario
section.para:
As you can see from the following listing the XML scenario is defined by urn:perfcake:scenario:6.0 namespace
Schema can be found at
. The scenario is divided into several sections: Properties, Run, Generator, Sender, Reporting, Messages and Validation.

section.title: Scenario structure
section.programlisting:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <scenario xmlns="urn:perfcake:scenario:6.0"> <!-- Scenario properties (optional) --> <properties> <property name="..." value="..."/> ... </properties>
<!-- Run section (required) --> <run ... > ... </run>
<!-- Generator section (required) --> <generator ... > ... </generator>
<!-- Sender section (required) --> <sender ... > ... </sender>
<!-- Reporting section (optional) --> <reporting> ... </reporting>
<!-- Messages section (optional) --> <messages> ... </messages>
<!-- Sequences section (optional) --> <sequences> ... </sequences>
<!-- Validation section (optional) --> <validation> ... </validation> </scenario>
